text: Louis Joseph "Leapin' Louie" Fontinato (January 20, 1932 â€“ July 3, 2016) was a Canadian defenceman in the National Hockey League. He played with the New York Rangers from 1954 to 1961 and the Montreal Canadiens from 1961 to 1963. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2016 deaths Category:New York Rangers players Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:Ice hockey people from Guelph Category:Memorial Cup winners Category:Ice hockey defencemen
